title: Australia : the Land of my dreams = Kraj moich marzen
creator_credit: Mariola Gorna and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: Born in Poland, Mariola chose to come to Australia. After a long wait in Greece, she was finally granted the right to immigrate to Australia. She tells of the second family she found at Brintons carpet factory and how they were there for her during some of her most difficult times.
